aboutUs.title: About the Charitable Foundation
aboutUs.modalTitle: To become our partner, leave your contact details

segments.text: was founded on 31.10.2023 by the Nikonchuk family: Oleh and Yevheniia. The foundation helps homeless animals affected by the war and those in frontline areas using the family’s own funds. Due to the constant danger, ensuring their survival is an extremely difficult task. Animals are often left alone with the war, suffering from hunger, cold, disease, and human aggression. The foundation’s mission is to provide animals with medicine, food, vaccinations, sterilization, and most importantly — a chance for rescue and hope for a dignified life.

is to break through people’s indifference and irresponsibility towards animals. People must stop treating animals as objects. This is what humanity truly means. An animal’s life should be valuable to a human! An animal deserves love and safety just as much as a human does!

aboutOwner.title: ABOUT THE CO-FOUNDERS OF THE FOUNDATION

segments.text: The founders of the foundation are the Nikonchuk family. Oleh Nikonchuk is the founder of the IT companies 'Versiya' and 'Navionika', which exclusively represent Garmin, Simrad, Lowrance, B&G, Deeper, and Navico in Ukraine. Evheniia Nikonchuk is a two-time bodybuilding champion of Ukraine, vice-champion of the European fitness tournament FITPARADE. She dedicated 10 years to sports, worked as a fitness trainer, and conducted seminars on nutrition and training.

"Since childhood, I've always loved animals and dreamed of having a dog, but I was never allowed to have one," says Evheniia. Only at the age of 33 did she get her duo: Elsa, a husky, and Boom, a small mixed-breed dog she found on the roadside. "Animals teach us compassion and attentiveness to the weak. In charity, humanity grows," Evheniia says.

Since the start of the full-scale war, Evheniia’s husband has supported the military, while she has focused on animals — the most vulnerable and overlooked group. With family funds, over 5 tons of food and hundreds of medicines, vaccines, and treatments have been sent. But as the number of strays keeps growing, especially near the frontlines, the idea of the 'Tail Angels' Foundation was born — to expand help and unite caring people.
"My mission as a co-founder is to show that animals are part of Ukraine — they are our family. We must be more caring, not only to our pets but also to those without one," says Evheniia.

segments.text: Sterilization is an important step toward a happy future for our furry friends! Every day, hundreds of stray animals suffer due to overpopulation and lack of resources. Sterilization is not just about preventing unwanted litters but also about preserving the lives and health of adult animals. Your contribution will help us sterilize even more tail-waggers, reducing the number of stray animals and improving their quality of life. Every donation is a saved destiny.
Our foundation actively participates in reducing the number of stray animals in a humane way. We have already managed to sterilize 11 dogs and 26 cats.

hero.title: Partnership to Save Animals from War

content.title: To become our partner
content.description: Friends, we decided to organize charitable events ourselves to support animals in frontline territories.

sections.title: How do we achieve this?
items: give you unforgettable emotions, good mood and gifts with our furry friends

sections.title: What will you get at our charity events?
items: exclusive and unique gifts that you can't buy online
gifts personally from us and our partners

partnership.modalTitle: To become our partner, please leave your contact details.

chairtyEvents.title: Our Charity Events
paragraphs: Friends, let's imagine what emotions charity foundations often evoke in us? Emotions of sadness, pain, hopelessness... Everything that fills us in these difficult times is sorrow, anxiety, stress.
Analyzing this, we decided to approach charity through entertainment. This is a chance to help animals not just through donations, but by participating in fun events.

Unfortunately, during the war, it is very difficult to be in a good and joyful state, we understand this very well. Because of this, it’s hard to complete many fundraisers. People are tired of donating, they often walk by and remain indifferent because they are filled with disappointment and sadness.

We have already held 2 charity events that we organized ourselves. At the first event, we painted pictures on canvases with handprints of the owners and paw prints of their tails. The second event was very atmospheric, styled for Halloween, with a photo zone, prizes, costumes, and contests.
benefitsParagraphs: Interesting and exciting entertainment: we conduct various interactive activities where everyone receives gifts, and also create unique and exclusive items together with you that cannot be bought anywhere.
After our events, everyone is left with great mood, positive emotions, and cool photos.
We create unique themed photo zones, costume looks, and props.
chairtyEvents.missionParagraph: Helping animals in frontline areas through good emotions and entertainment.
botParagraphs: We are looking for partners and like-minded people and are open to cooperation. So, if you want to join us, we will be happy to consider your proposal.
Dear friends, we are waiting for each of you at our charity events! Follow the news. Become Angels for Tails with us!
